ux_principles.speed: Every action completes in under 200ms perceived time. Optimistic UI updates before server confirms.
ux_principles.density: Information-dense but not cluttered. Data tables show 15-20 rows. Use compact mode toggle.
ux_principles.keyboard_first: Every action reachable by keyboard. Shortcuts displayed in tooltips. Full Tab order in forms.
ux_principles.progressive_disclosure: Show overview first, drill-down on demand. No walls of data upfront.
ux_principles.accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA. Minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio. ARIA labels on all interactive elements.
ux_principles.error_prevention: Confirm dialogs for destructive actions. Undo mechanism for soft deletes. Auto-save drafts.
ux_principles.feedback: Micro-animations on every interaction. Loading skeletons instead of spinners. Progress indicators for long operations.
ux_principles.consistency: Same interaction patterns across all modules. Learn once, use everywhere.
ux_principles.mobile_responsive: Dock collapses to icon-only on tablet. Full-screen panels on mobile. Touch-optimized POS.
ux_principles.dark_mode: Dark mode is the default and primary theme. Light mode is optional.

tech_stack_recommendation.styling: Tailwind CSS 3 + CSS custom properties for theme tokens
tech_stack_recommendation.routing: React Router v6 or TanStack Router
